definition: see 做派[zuo4 pai4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
worker/workshop/(slang) troublesome/high-maintenance (person)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
way of doing sth/behavior/to act in an affected manner/mannerism/gestures in opera
to put on an attitude/to pose
manner/style/panache
posturing/pretentious/affected
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
overbearing/arrogant bully
style/style of work/way
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
arrogant
pampered son of a wealthy family
domineering/bossy
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
to put on an act
bearing/manner/mien
to put on airs/to be ostentatious
